entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. High minus 7. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries early this morning. Becoming a mix of sun and cloud this afternoon. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 except gusting to 80 along parts of the coast this morning. High minus 7. Wind chill minus 22 this morning and minus 14 this afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:30 AM NST Sunday 12 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries. Temperature rising to minus 4 by morning. POP 40%
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. 40 percent chance of flurries overnight. Wind west 20 km/h becoming southwest 30 gusting to 50 this evening. Temperature rising to minus 4 by morning. Wind chill near minus 14. Forecast issued 05:30 AM NST Sunday 12 February 2023
